name: bless-anime-game
description: Anime style game using Blockless SDK

scripts.build:debug: npm run prebuild && npm run copy:wasm && npm run copy:draco && esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --log-level=info && npm run copy:public && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f debug.wasm
scripts.build:release: npm run prebuild && npm run copy:wasm && npm run copy:draco && esbuild src/core/main.ts --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --minify --log-level=info && npm run copy:public && bls-sdk-ts build ./index.ts -o ./build -f release.wasm
scripts.dev: npm run build:debug && npm run serve
scripts.postinstall: npm run copy:wasm && npm run copy:draco
